articles.title: Everything New in the iOS 18.5 Beta

articles.content: Apple today provided developers with the first beta of an upcoming iOS 18.5 update for testing purposes. Work on iOS 18 is starting to wind down with iOS 19 set to be introduced in a couple of months, so iOS 18.5 has just a handful of minor new featu... [1415 chars]

articles.title: First-party Switch 2 games-including re-releases-all run either $70 or $80
articles.description: All Nintendo titles see an increase from the $60 Switch 1 status quo.

articles.title: Nintendo Switch 2: Everything announced including a new Mario Kart game, new Switch features and more
articles.description: Nintendo released a ton of details on the Switch 2 hardware as well as new games that you'll be able to play on the system when it arrives.
articles.content:
The console arrives on June 5, and a new Mario Kart game will be out the same day.
After months of anticipation and years of speculation, Nintendo is finally spilling all the beans about the Switch 2. In a Nintendo Direct presentation, the company is... [6348 chars]

articles.title: Is the $450 Nintendo Switch 2 too expensive?
articles.description: Should the Switch 2 really cost as much as a PlayStation 5 Slim?
articles.content: It seems fitting that Nintendo didn’t reveal the Switch 2’s $450 price during its Direct stream this morning — it would have just bummed everyone out. After spending an hour hearing about how the Switch 2 practically fixes almost every problem we had... [3204 chars]

articles.title: An AI Model Has Officially Passed the Turing Test
articles.description: OpenAI's GPT-4.5 model passed a Turing Test with flying colors, and even came off as human more than the actual humans.
articles.content:
One of the industry's leading large language models has passed a Turing test, a longstanding barometer for human-like intelligence.
In a new preprint study awaiting peer review, researchers report that in a three-party version of a Turing test, in wh... [4272 chars]

articles.title: WordPress maker Automattic lays off 16% of staff
articles.description: Automattic, the company behind WordPress.com, Tumblr, WooCommerce, and a range of other online services, is reducing its workforce. The layoffs will
articles.content:
Automattic, the company behind WordPress.com, Tumblr, WooCommerce, and a range of other online services, is reducing its workforce. The layoffs will impact 16% of staff across divisions, an Automattic blog post published Wednesday reveals.
Ahead of t... [2259 chars]

articles.title: Best Buy to open stores at midnight for Nintendo Switch 2 launch; pre-orders available April 9
articles.description: For the first time in six years, customers who pre-order at Best Buy have extra to be excited about.

articles.title: Sony’s new Bravia lineup includes its ‘King of TV’ successor
articles.description: ​​Sony is updating its AV lineup today with some significant new Bravia products.
articles.content: Sony has a replacement for its current flagship QD-OLED TV, the extremely well-received A95L. That’s the model that was crowned “King of TV” at last year’s Value Electronics TV Shootout, which Verge editor-in-chief Nilay Patel served on the judging p... [5484 chars]

articles.title: Sony's 2025 Bravia TV lineup includes a new flagship QD-OLED model
articles.description: For 2025, Sony is announcing three new Bravia TVs headlined by its new Bravia 8 II flagship QD-OLED set.
articles.content: Samsung and LG got a headstart on Sony when they announced their new 2025 TVs a few months ago at CES. But now, the latter is catching up with the pending arrival of three new Bravia sets, including a refreshed flagship QD-OLED, a midrange mini LED o... [2940 chars]
